sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ dìngqī qù kàn yīshēng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je vais régulièrement chez le médecin.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I go to the doctor regularly.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 节日里充满了欢乐的气氛。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Jiérì lǐ chōngmǎn le huānlè de qìfēn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'atmosphère est pleine de joie pendant les fêtes.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The festival is full of a joyful atmosphere.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ nǎinai zuò de fàn hěn hǎochī.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La nourriture préparée par ma grand-mère est délicieuse.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The food my grandmother makes is delicious.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tiān lěng le, dàishang màozi ba.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il fait froid, mets ton chapeau.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: It's cold, put on a hat.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng tiánxiě nǐ de xìngbié.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez indiquer votre sexe.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please fill in your gender.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Jīngjù shì Zhōngguó chuántǒng yìshù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'opéra de Pékin est un art traditionnel chinois.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Peking Opera is a traditional Chinese art.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tāmen de gǎnqíng hěn hǎo.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Leur relation est très bonne.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Their relationship is very good.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhège ruǎnjiàn yìngyòng hěn guǎngfàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce logiciel est largement utilisé.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This software is widely used.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng bǎ cài fàng zài pánzi lǐ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Mettez les légumes dans l'assiette.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please put the food on the plate.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这个问题产生了很多讨论。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhège wèntí chǎnshēng le hěn duō tǎolùn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce problème a suscité beaucoup de discussions.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This issue has generated a lot of discussion.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā réngrán zhù zài lǎo fángzi lǐ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il vit encore dans la vieille maison.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He still lives in the old house.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng shuō de jùtǐ yīdiǎn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Soyez plus précis s'il vous plaît.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please be more specific.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我们应该尊重对方的意见。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen yīnggāi zūnzhòng duìfāng de yìjiàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous devons respecter l'opinion de l'autre partie.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We should respect the other party's opinion.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng jǐnliàng zǎodiǎn lái.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Essayez de venir le plus tôt possible.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please try to come as early as possible.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ céngjīng qùguò Fǎguó.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je suis déjà allé en France.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I have been to France before.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Kǎoshì qián wǒ zǒng shì hěn jǐnzhāng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je suis toujours nerveux avant un examen.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I'm always nervous before exams.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhōngguó běifāng de dōngtiān hěn lěng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'hiver dans le nord de la Chine est très froid.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Winter in northern China is very cold.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Jīnglǐ jīntiān bùzài bàngōngshì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le directeur n'est pas au bureau aujourd'hui.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The manager is not in the office today.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wàimiàn xià yǔ le, dàishang sǎn ba.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il pleut dehors, prends un parapluie.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: It's raining outside, take an umbrella.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ shēnshang méi dài xiànjīn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je n'ai pas d'argent liquide sur moi.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I don't have cash on me.
